page.title: 04An 11 Year Olds's Day
page.content: I rise at 7.30am I put on my school uniform, a navy blue jumper, grey skirt and white blouse. I go and get my breakfast which is cereal. I eat my breakfast on my own. I have a wash and brush my hair. I walk to school with my friends. At break I like playing a game called SPIDER. One person stands still and the others hold onto his jumper and keep on saying "SPIDER". Then when he wants he says "poison in the bottle 123". Then you run, when he catches someone he holds their hand. If there are four caught, they can split into two's. The game ends when there is one person left. That person is it and the game starts again. School ends at 3.30pm. After school I call for my friend Debbie and we go out to play.
